ValidationRule.description: This Validation Rule informs users of the blank fields they must complete prior to updating an FRA/TSA Requests Case to Closed Status.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL(NS_InteractionReason__c,'FRA/TSA Requests') , ISPICKVAL(Status,'NS_Closed') , RecordType.Name!='NS Internal', NS_Created_using_Quick_Case__c <> True, ISBLANK(NS_CustomerNotifiedDateTime__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete Date Customer Notified prior to closing the Case.
